pages.title: Particle Spawner
pages.text: $(italic)$You have a penchant for chic decorations. But the decoration includes not only blocks, but also the right staging.$(br)A shower of particles around your most precious belongings on the pedestals, for example.$(br)Creating a bit of glitter is a breeze for you by now, so the Particle Spawner was born.

The Particle Emitter offers a wide range of settings for which particles with which properties should be created in the environment.$(br2)The Particle Emitter is very good at adding that last bit of polish to your builds.
